column1: A '''Valian year''' is a reference to the passage of time in [[Valinor]]
column2: before the [[Two Trees of Valinor|Two Trees]] were destroyed by [[Morgoth|Melkor]] and [[Ungoliant]]. Valian years ended with the rising of the [[Sun]] during the [[First Age]]. There are approximately 9.582 solar years in a Valian year
column4: 325 solar years in the [[Years of the Trees]].
